alert.note: Alert for Cotton (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 18 at 2:39PM CDT until October 19 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Cotton County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
